name: Retrieve the Summary Informaction for a customer

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000930000403000"

When I retrieve the Customer Demographics Summary information for customer
| cifKey |
| 0100000930000403000 |

Then The following Customer Demographics Summary information should be returned
| customerSuffix | customerLastName | customerFirstName | customerGender | dateOfBirth |
|  | O'Byrne | Nuala | F |  |

children.description: Validate response: | customerSuffix | customerLastName | customerFirstName | customerGender | dateOfBirth | | | O'Byrne | Nuala | F | |

userStory.storyName: API to allow the retieval of the Customer Name and other information in a more usuable foramt for the front end

title: Retrieve the Summary Informaction for a customer
